name: Jimmy Greene
description: '''James Sidney Greene, Jr.''' (born February 24, 1975) is an American [[jazz]] [[saxophonist]], [[gospel music]]ian, recording artist, record producer, and music professor. He started his music career in 1997, and has since released eight [[studio album]]s. His eighth studio album, ''[[Beautiful Life (Jimmy Greene album)|Beautiful Life]]'', was his breakthrough release upon the [[Billboard (magazine)|''Billboard'' magazine]] charts. It also received his first [[Grammy Award]] nominations.
